verses.verse: The words <S%H1697><s%> of the Preacher <S%H6953><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, king <S%H4428><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.
Vanity <S%H1892><s%> of vanities <S%H1892><s%>, says <S%H559><s%> the Preacher <S%H6953><s%>, vanity <S%H1892><s%> of vanities <S%H1892><s%>; all is vanity <S%H1892><s%>.
What profit <S%H3504><s%> has a man <S%H120><s%> of all his labor <S%H5999><s%> which he takes <S%H5998><s%> under the sun <S%H8121><s%>?
One generation <S%H1755><s%> passes away <S%H1980><s%>, and another generation <S%H1755><s%> comes <S%H935><s%>: but the earth <S%H776><s%> stays <S%H5975><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
The sun <S%H8121><s%> also arises <S%H2224><s%>, and the sun <S%H8121><s%> goes down <S%H935><s%>, and hastens <S%H7602><s%> to his place <S%H4725><s%> where he arose <S%H2224><s%>.

The wind <S%H7307><s%> goes <S%H1980><s%> toward the south <S%H1864><s%>, and turns about <S%H5437><s%> unto the north <S%H6828><s%>; it whirls about continually <S%H1980><s%>, and the wind <S%H7307><s%> returns again <S%H7725><s%> according to his circuits <S%H5439><s%>.

All the rivers <S%H5158><s%> run <S%H1980><s%> into the sea <S%H3220><s%>; yet the sea <S%H3220><s%> is not full <S%H4392><s%>; unto the place <S%H4725><s%> from from where the rivers <S%H5158><s%> come <S%H1980><s%>, there they return <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H3212><s%>.

All things <S%H1697><s%> are full of labor <S%H3023><s%>; man <S%H376><s%> cannot <S%H3201><s%> utter <S%H1696><s%> it <S%H5869><s%>: the eye is not satisfied <S%H7646><s%> with seeing <S%H7200><s%>, nor the ear <S%H241><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> with hearing <S%H8085><s%>.

The thing that has been <S%H6213><s%>, it is that which shall be; and that which is done is that which shall be done <S%H6213><s%>: and there is no new <S%H2319><s%> thing under the sun <S%H8121><s%>.

Is there <S%H3426><s%> any thing <S%H1697><s%> whereof it may be said <S%H559><s%>, See <S%H7200><s%>, this is new <S%H2319><s%>? it has been already <S%H3528><s%> of old time <S%H5769><s%>, which was before us <S%H6440><s%>.
There is no memory <S%H2146><s%> of former <S%H7223><s%> things <S%H2146><s%>; neither shall there be any memory of things that are to come <S%H314><s%> with those that shall come after <S%H314><s%>.
I the Preacher <S%H6953><s%> was king <S%H4428><s%> over Israel <S%H3478><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

And I gave <S%H5414><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> to seek <S%H1875><s%> and search out <S%H8446><s%> by wisdom <S%H2451><s%> concerning all things that are done <S%H6213><s%> under heaven <S%H8064><s%>: this severe <S%H7451><s%> hardship <S%H6045><s%> has God <S%H430><s%> given <S%H5414><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> to be exercised with it <S%H6031><s%>.

I have seen <S%H7200><s%> all the works <S%H4639><s%> that are done <S%H6213><s%> under the sun <S%H8121><s%>; and <S%H1892><s%>, behold, all is vanity and vexation <S%H7469><s%> of spirit <S%H7307><s%>.
That which is crooked <S%H5791><s%> cannot <S%H3201><s%> be made straight <S%H8626><s%>: and that which is wanting <S%H2642><s%> cannot <S%H3201><s%> be numbered <S%H4487><s%>.

I talked <S%H1696><s%> with my own heart <S%H3820><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H1431><s%>, I am come to great estate, and have gotten <S%H3254><s%> more wisdom <S%H2451><s%> than all they that have been before <S%H6440><s%> me in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>: Yes <S%H3820><s%>, my heart had great <S%H7235><s%> experience <S%H7200><s%> of wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and knowledge <S%H1847><s%>.

And I gave <S%H5414><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> to know <S%H3045><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%>, and to know <S%H3045><s%> madness <S%H1947><s%> and wickedness <S%H5531><s%>: I perceived <S%H3045><s%> that this <S%H1571><s%> also is vexation <S%H7475><s%> of spirit <S%H7307><s%>.
For in much <S%H7230><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is much <S%H7230><s%> grief <S%H3708><s%>: and he that increases <S%H3254><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%> increases <S%H3254><s%> sorrow <S%H4341><s%>.
